mapper.select: select p.id as productId, productName, price, imgUrl_1, cp.name as companyName, sale, qty, ((price - (price * sale / 100 )) * qty) as total, (price - (price * sale / 100 )) as curPrice from cart c, product p, company cp where c.userId = #{id} and c.productId = p.id and cp.id = p.companyId
select count(*) from cart where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(userId,productId,createDate, qty) values(#{userId},#{productId}, now(),#{qty})
mapper.update: update cart set qty = qty + #{qty} where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: select (qty * price)as total from cart c, product p where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId} and c.productId = p.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
